welcome.title: Teach the world!
welcome.description: Welcome to LearnHouse, an LMS designed for simplicity, ease of use and performance. Discover the new way to create, share and interact with educational content.

courses.title: Create Courses
courses.description: Courses are the main building blocks of LearnHouse, they always contain Chapters and Chapters contain Activities.

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: Activities are elements you can add to your Courses through Chapters, they can be: Dynamic Pages, Videos, Documents, Quizzes and more coming soon.

editor.title: Dynamic Pages and The Editor
editor.description: Dynamic pages are pages with dynamic content, like Notion pages they can contain multiple components like Quizzes, Images, Videos, Documents etc.
editor.learnMoreButton: Learn more about Dynamic Pages and The Editor

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Thinking tools made for teachers and students, with contextual knowledge can answer based on your courses and the unique content you create in LearnHouse.

usergroups.title: Group students and optimize access
usergroups.description: With User Groups you can separate students by Groups and give access to Courses depending on their needs.

access.title: Choose whether to make Courses available on the Web or not
access.description: You can choose to make your Courses discoverable by search engines and accessible to unauthenticated users or only provide them to authenticated Users.

assignments.title: Create and Evaluate Assignments
assignments.description: Engage students with assignments, track their progress and provide feedback through our intuitive grading system.

payments.title: Monetize Your Content
payments.description: Set up payment plans, sell courses and manage subscriptions with our integrated payment system.

more.title: To infinity and beyond
more.description: To learn more about LearnHouse, you're welcome to follow our original courses at LearnHouse University.
